name: That's Not My Name
description:
This is for a 2 week project for Studio 2 (a module within the game design course) at SAE.


Synopsis

Have you ever told anyone what you want to be called, but for whatever reason, they just call you everything but that? Well, That's Not My Name sets out to capture that experience - How it feels to be called something you don't see yourself as.

Within That's Not My Name , the player is stopping off at their home town during their travels but the village elder won't let you leave until you catch up with everyone. You need to talk to everyone and deal with them referring to you as the wrong name until the leader lets you resume your travels.

How to play

Menu Navigation and Movement - WASD or ARROW keys.

Confirm or Select - ENTER KEY or SPACEBAR.

Pause - ESCAPE.

Credits
